result.eng: There was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ga: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.orig: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin
result.html: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ ocras i ċuile ṫeaċ an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.orig: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna
result.html: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: I eat every type of food.
result.html: Ithim chuile shórt biaI eat every type of food.
result.ponchtml: Iṫim ċuile ẛórt biaI eat every type of food.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadhI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige ċuile lá den ḃliain Fiú sa ġeiṁreaḋI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
